parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: SecurityIpGroupName
parameters.description: The information of the IP address whitelist group.

parameters.name: SecurityIps
parameters.description:
The list of IP addresses and CIDR blocks in the whitelist.   
It is a JSON array. Each object in the array is an IP address or CIDR block. You can specify at most 40 IP addresses or CIDR blocks.
